description:
Taiki and his team arrive in the Sand Zone, which once thrived as an area rich in precious gems. They decide to take a shot at treasure hunting, but along the way they fall into the Bagra Army`s underground base and find themselves on the run. They are saved by a treasure hunter Digimon, Revolmon, who then insists that they return the favor by helping him hunt for treasure. They set off into the ruins where the treasure is said to be hidden, but are impeded by various traps and pursued yet again by the Bagra Army. At last they reach the final chamber, where the mysterious Digimon Pharaohmon awaits them...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sand Zone and the Great Adventure in the Ruins!
サンドゾーン, 遺跡で大冒険!
